metadata.title: VidFab AI Video Generator with Stunning Video Effects | Create Easily
metadata.description: Transform your videos with AI-powered effects. Our video generator offers cutting-edge video creation tools for stunning results. Try it free!

hero.title: Enhance Your Videos With Stunning AI-Powered Video Effects
hero.subtitle: Transform ordinary clips into eye-catching videos with a wide range of AI-driven effects. From cinematic filters and smooth transitions to stylized animations, VidFab AI makes professional editing effortless.
hero.cta: Try AI Video Effects for Free

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Create professional videos in four simple steps

steps.title: Choose a desired effect
steps.description: Browse our library of stunning AI-powered video effects and select the one that matches your creative vision.

steps.title: Upload the photo or enter the text to replace the elements of the selected effect
steps.description: Customize the effect by uploading your own media or entering text to replace elements in the template.

steps.title: Process with AI
steps.description: Our advanced AI models analyze your input and apply the selected effects with professional quality.

steps.title: View the video online and download for use
steps.description: Preview your enhanced video, make any final adjustments, and download it in high quality for your projects.

items.question: How does VidFab AI generate videos automatically?
items.answer: It transforms written prompts or scripts into moving visuals by using powerful AI models. The system interprets your text, generates frames that match your description, and ensures motion consistency.

items.question: Is VidFab AI Video Generator beginner-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! Anyone from a beginner to an expert can create videos on VidFab. You can create explainer videos, marketing videos, promo videos & many more using VidFab.

items.question: What languages are supported for text input?
items.answer: We currently support multiple languages including English, Japanese, Spanish, and more. Support for additional languages is being added regularly.

items.question: Do I need to download any software to use VidFab AI video generator?
items.answer: No downloads are needed to generate videos using VidFab. It is a web-based tool, and it works well on all popular browsers such as Safari, Google Chrome, and others on all devices from mobile to desktops.

items.question: Can I use VidFab for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, our service supports both personal and commercial purposes. However, please ensure compliance with our terms of use.

items.question: Can I use VidFab AI Video Generator for Free?
items.answer: Yes. VidFab will provide 50 credits, allowing you to try generating videos initially.

community.title: Find More Inspirations in VidFab

community.description: Explore unlimited inspiration alongside other VidFab users. Let creativity be inspired by shared excitement and collaborative genius.
